snippet.title: Death Rally Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW ON THE APP STORE AS A UNIVERSAL APP FOR iPAD, iPHONE AND iPOD TOUCH DEVICES!
http://bit.ly/gCvsn9

Gun the engine and load your guns - the classic is back!

Remedy's very first game is now bigger, stronger and more vicious than ever. Make a run for the finish line with a trail of burnt rubber and spent brass behind you... along with the flaming wreckage of any fool dumb enough to get in your way.

This is not a Sunday drive. This is DEATH RALLY.

For more info on Death Rally head over to the official Death Rally site at http://www.death-rally.com/ or follow us on our social media channels for lots of free giveaways, competitions, exclusive content and the latest news: Facebook - http://facebook.com/deathrally or Twitter - http://twitter.com/remedyalerts
